# largeContentImage

**Instance Property**

An image that represents an item to display in the large content viewer.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var largeContentImage: UIImage? { get }
```

## Discussion

To present content in the large content viewer, you can provide either [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UILargeContentViewerItem/largeContentTitle] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UILargeContentViewerItem/largeContentImage], or both.

This property defaults to an appropriate value for UIKit classes, otherwise `nil`.

## Configuring display properties

- **largeContentTitle**: A string that describes an item to display in the large content viewer.
- **largeContentImageInsets**: Insets to adjust the position of the item’s image so it appears visually centered in the large content viewer.
- **scalesLargeContentImage**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view scales the item’s image to a larger size or not.
